item.title: An introduction to coordinate systems used in astronomy
item.dc:creator: Adeel Ahmad
item.description: Before moving on to the coordinate systems, listed below are some common measures used in astronomical studies. RA / DEC RA (right ascension) and DEC (declination) are the longitudes and latitudes of the sky.
